description: The US military says it responded after a vessel came under attack near Yemen twice in 24 hours.
maintext: The helicopters "returned fire in self-defence, sinking three of the four small boats, and killing the crews", Centcom said. It added that the fourth boat "fled the area" and no damage had been recorded to US personnel or equipment.
title: US Navy helicopters destroy Houthi boats in Red Sea after attempted hijack
